pr_title: DHFPROD-5718: Entity name shouldn't appear as facet

timeline.bodyText:
This is fine for now, but really, a custom constraint would be better here. That's because it would avoid having ML calculate the number of documents in the entity-name collection, which would speed up search.
But really, the right long term solution is to not have a collection facet. That's on my kill list for 5.4.0.
Pinging @fsnow  about this too, just for awareness.
timeline.author: rjrudin
